resources.string: Five (5) CSEC subjects including English and Mathematics (A CSEC pass at level 3 must have been obtained since 1998.)\n\n Candidates with a minimum of 4 CXCs can apply pending outstanding CSEC results (or do UCC replacement courses - Core Mathematics, English for Academic Purpose)

Degree Type: Bachelor of Science
 Credits: 124
 Next Start Date: May (Summer) 2025
 Awarding Institution: University of the Commonwealth Caribbean
 Delivery Modality: 100% Online & Blended
